jd: From: Ashish Kumar, THEMESOFT INC ashish@themesoft.com Reply to: ashish@themesoft.com Job Title: D365 Lead DeveloperLocation: Seattle, WA (Remote)D365 CRM Technical ArchitectRemote ok - PST preferred; or must be willing to work PST hours.
